entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editor and debugger don't agree on breakpoint range #74795
  • CS8344 error even with C# 13 (ref in iterators/async) #74793

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to basic ref assemblies for net40 #74796
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Move net451 test assets to net461 #74766
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue where output path set in construction never updated the project update state #74791
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
